title: Bug 49536: Incorrect HTTP status code returned when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed
description: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I expect to receive an HTTP error 404. However, the server is returning an HTTP code 200 OK with no content. This behavior is inconsistent and should be fixed.
OB: When I access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When I access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404 indicating that the requested resource does not exist.
SR:
1. Download and install Tomcat 7 instance.
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the server using a web browser or cURL.
4. Verify that the server returns an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
